title: Interface (AudioSpatializationManager)
summary: Audio Kit Multimedia 模块的 Interface (AudioSpatializationManager)，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: isSpatializationEnabledForCurrentDevice<sup>18+</sup>
sections.summary:
isSpatializationEnabledForCurrentDevice(): boolean

获取当前设备空间音频渲染是否开启。同步返回结果。

**系统能力：** SystemCapab

sections.title: on('spatializationEnabledChangeForCurrentDevice')<sup>18+</sup>
sections.summary:
on(type: 'spatializationEnabledChangeForCurrentDevice', callback: Callback<boolean\>): void

监听当前设备

sections.title: off('spatializationEnabledChangeForCurrentDevice')<sup>18+</sup>
sections.summary:
off(type: 'spatializationEnabledChangeForCurrentDevice', callback?: Callback<boolean\>): void

取消监听
